[sarcastic] Right, of course.
Well, um, sure.
[frustrated] You know what's fascinating is how you can sit there, [voice rising], pretending this is just business when we both, [trembling], know exactly what this is, [quieter], really about.
[measured] I'm, uh, evaluating your company based on, [clinical], its merit and market position, not on, um, whatever personal narrative you're constructing here. [clears throat]
